WorkItem.Description:
RAWR is calculating total avoidance (miss+dodge+parry+block) until 100% only, but the correct is 102,4% for raid bosses (it seems it is not taking into account the level difference). I checked the boss level config and it is set at 88.
   If I respec/regem/enchant as RAWR points out, some avoidance will be missing.

Comments.Message: I might be wrong, but I think the displayed number in Rawr already takes level difference in account. The 102.4% you're referring to is what you would see in game which is against same level target.

You might be right, but I after the RAWR proposed gearing was setup, I ran this macro in-game:  "/run DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("Need 102.4 combat table coverage. Currently at: "..string.format("%.2f", GetDodgeChance()+GetBlockChance()+GetParryChance() +5))" and the macro result was (close to) 100, not 102.4
   Unless the macro do the same, but since it seems to get the raw chance, I believe it doesn't.
